title: Venezuela Frees US Citizen Amid Gradual Prisoner Releases
description: The Venezuelan government has started releasing prisoners with US citizenship, people with knowledge of the situation said.
content: The Venezuelan government has started releasing prisoners with US citizenship, people with knowledge of the situation said.
